content: Change Language and Time Zone Settings to adjust common {{productName}} language and time.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a descriptive text that explains the purpose of adjusting language and time zone settings in the application. It is displayed as part of a UI element to inform users about the impact on common product language and time, typically found in a Portal Settings category or customization options.

usage.context:
) : null}
{t("TimeLanguageSettingsDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName"), })}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'قم بتغيير إعدادت اللغة والمنطقة الزمنية لتعديل اللغة والتوقيت {{productName}} الشائع' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'Change Language and Time Zone Settings to adjust common {{productName}} language and time.'. The phrasing 'لتعديل اللغة والتوقيت' is awkward. It literally translates to 'to adjust the language and time,' but the intention is to adjust the *settings* which control language and time.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتغيير إعدادات اللغة والمنطقة الزمنية لضبط لغة وتوقيت {{productName}} الشائعة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The adjective 'الشائع' (al-shaa'i') is placed after 'توقيت' which is unusual in Arabic sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتغيير إعدادات اللغة والمنطقة الزمنية لضبط لغة وتوقيت {{productName}} الشائعة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Change Language and Time Zone Settings" is not accurately translated. 'Parametrlərini dəyişdirin' is a general 'change settings' and doesn't convey the specific meaning of changing language and time zone settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ümumi {{productName}} dilini və saat zonasını təyin etmək üçün Dil və Saat Zonası ayarlarını dəyişdirin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of “{{productName}}” is consistent across the English and Azerbaijani versions, which is good.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: N/A - Consistent formatting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'коригирате общия език и час' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'adjust common language and time'. It suggests a correction or calibration, which isn't the intended meaning.  'Adjust' implies a customization, not a correction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Променете настройките за език и часова зона, за да персонализирате езика и часа на {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pro nastavení běžného jazyka a času" is a somewhat literal and less natural translation of "to adjust common language and time."  It implies *setting* the common language and time, rather than *adjusting* them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Změna nastavení jazyka a časového pásma pro úpravu běžného jazyka a času v {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'προσαρμογή της κοινής γλώσσας και ώρας' (adjustment of the common language and time) is not the best translation for 'adjust common {{productName}} language and time'. It sounds a bit awkward in Greek. A more natural phrasing would focus on setting or configuring.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Αλλαγή ρυθμίσεων γλώσσας και ζώνης ώρας για την ρύθμιση της γλώσσας και ώρας του {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation retains the double curly braces '{{productName}}'. While technically correct, it might be best to remove them if the placeholder is always handled dynamically during rendering.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Αλλαγή ρυθμίσεων γλώσσας και ζώνης ώρας για την ρύθμιση της γλώσσας και ώρας του [productName].

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "yleistä {{productName}}-n kieltä" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "common {{productName}} language." It implies the language *of* the product, rather than the language used *within* the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vaihda Kieli- ja aikavyöhykeasetuksia muokataksesi {{productName}}-tuotteen kieltä ja aikaa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of a hyphen in "{{productName}}-tuotteen" is potentially unnecessary. Consider whether it's stylistically required or whether removing it would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vaihda Kieli- ja aikavyöhykeasetuksia muokataksesi {{productName}} tuotteen kieltä ja aikaa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to adjust the language and time of {{productName}}' is a slightly awkward translation.  A more natural phrasing in French might emphasize adjusting the display or settings *for* the user's language and time zone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Modifiez les paramètres de langue et de fuseau horaire pour adapter la langue et l'heure à votre {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation includes a hyphen in "ժամային-գոտու". It should be a single word: ժամայինգոտու.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Փոխեք լեզվի և ժամայինգոտու կարգավորումները՝ {{productName}}-ի ընդհանուր լեզուն և ժամը հարմարեցնելու համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'comuni di' is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'common' in this context. It implies that the language and time are 'common' *to* something, which is not the intention.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Modifica le impostazioni di lingua e fuso orario per personalizzare la lingua e l'ora di {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '언어 및 시간대 설정을 변경하세요' is a bit literal and could be more natural. A more common phrasing would be '언어 및 시간 설정을 변경하세요'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 언어 및 시간 설정을 변경하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ປັບພາສາ ແລະເວລາ {{productName}} ທົ່ວໄປ" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "adjust common {{productName}} language and time."  It literally translates to 'adjust language and time {{productName}} generally.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປັບການໃຊ້ພາສາ ແລະເວລາຂອງ {{productName}} ທົ່ວໄປ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ທົ່ວໄປ' (general/common) seems redundant after 'ປັບການໃຊ້' which already implies this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປັບການໃຊ້ພາສາ ແລະເວລາຂອງ {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation 'Mainiet valodas un laika joslas iestatījumus, lai pielāgotu parasto {{productName}} valodu un laiku' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Latvian. 'pielāgotu' (to adapt) isn't the best word choice here. A more natural phrasing would be 'iestatīt' (to set) or 'norādīt' (to specify).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mainiet valodas un laika joslas iestatījumus, lai iestatītu parasto {{productName}} valodu un laiku.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Taal- en tijdzone-instellingen wijzigen om de taal en tijd van {{productName}} aan te passen' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Dutch. A more idiomatic translation would convey the meaning more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Taal- en tijdzone-instellingen wijzigen om de taal en tijd voor {{productName}} aan te passen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "wspólny język i czas {{productName}}" is an awkward and potentially inaccurate translation of "common {{productName}} language and time." It doesn't convey the intended meaning of adjusting settings *for* the product's language and time.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zmień ustawienia języka oraz strefy czasowej, aby dostosować język i czas dla {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "idioma e a hora comuns do {{productName}}" is not the best translation for "common {{productName}} language and time." A more natural phrasing would be something like "idioma e horário padrão do {{productName}}" or "idioma e horário do {{productName}}".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Altere as configurações de idioma e fuso horário para ajustar o idioma e horário do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ajustar o idioma e a hora comuns do {{productName}}" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "adjust common {{productName}} language and time." A better phrasing would be something like "configurar o idioma e a hora padrão do {{productName}}" or "configurar as configurações de idioma e fuso horário padrão do {{productName}}".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Altere as configurações de idioma e fuso horário para configurar as configurações de idioma e fuso horário padrão do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Change Language and Time Zone Settings" is not accurately reflected in the Romanian translation "Configurați setări limbă și fus orar". "Change" implies modification, while "Configurați" (configure) implies setting up for the first time.  A more accurate translation would convey the ability to modify existing settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Actualizați setările limbă și fus orar pentru a modifica limba și fusul orar al spațiului {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, "Configurați" followed by a conjunction "pentru a alege" is slightly clunky.  A more fluent phrasing is possible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Actualizați setările limbă și fus orar pentru a modifica limba și fusul orar al spațiului {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Измените настройки языка и часового пояса, чтобы настроить общий язык и время {{productName}}' is not an ideal translation of 'Change Language and Time Zone Settings to adjust common {{productName}} language and time.'. The phrase 'настроить общий язык' (adjust common language) is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Измените настройки языка и часового пояса для настройки языка и времени {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "පොදු {{productName}} භාෂාව සහ වේලාව සැකසීමට භාෂාව සහ වේලා කලාපයේ සැකසුම් වෙනස් කරන්න." is a bit convoluted and doesn't flow naturally. 'පොදු' (pōdu) translates to 'common' but using it in this context makes the sentence awkward. The phrase 'වේලා කලාපයේ සැකසුම්' (vēlā kālāpaye sākasaum) is also a less common phrasing.  It's suggesting setting time zone settings, which is accurate but doesn't match the elegance of the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පොදු {{productName}} භාෂාව සහ කාල සීමාව සැකසීමට, භාෂාව සහ වේලාව වෙනස් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '{{productName}}' appears consistent with the English. It should remain unchanged to allow for dynamic insertion.
The translation 'aby ste upravili' (so that you adjust) isn't the most natural way to express 'to adjust' in this context. A more suitable translation would convey the purpose of the settings change.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zmeňte nastavenia jazyka a časového pásma na zmenu štandardného jazyka a času {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'štandardný jazyk a času' is grammatically awkward. 'Času' should be 'Čas'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: štandardný jazyk a čas

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'prilagodite običajni jezik in čas' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'adjust common language and time'. It implies adapting the *default* language and time, which might not be the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Spremenite nastavitve jezika in časovnega pasu za prilagajanje jezika in časa v {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of '{{productName}}' might be awkward in the suggested correction depending on the context of the UI. It's crucial to ensure consistent placement within other similar strings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider re-evaluating the placement of '{{productName}}' to align with existing patterns within the Slovenian interface.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses Cyrillic script. While acceptable, consider if a Latin script (Latinica) translation is also needed to cater to users who prefer it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider providing a Latin script (Latinica) translation as well: "Промените Подешавања језика и временске зоне да подесите уобичајен {{productName}} језик и време."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Promenite Podešavanja jezika i vremenske zone da podesite uobičajen {{productName}} jezik i vreme' is not a direct and natural translation of 'Change Language and Time Zone Settings to adjust common {{productName}} language and time'.  'Podesite uobičajen...' sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Promenite Podešavanja jezika i vremenske zone da biste prilagodili jezik i vreme za {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ortak {{productName}} dilini" is not an accurate translation of "common {{productName}} language." It implies a shared or common language used by the product itself, rather than the user's preferred language for the product's interface. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of user settings for language.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcı {{productName}} dil ayarlarını değiştirin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. The use of "ve" (and) connecting "dili" (language) and "saatini" (time) feels unnatural in Turkish in this context. It would be better to separate these concerns.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcı {{productName}} dilini ve saat dilimini ayarlamak için Dil ve Saat Dilimi Ayarlarını değiştirin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content uses double curly braces `{{productName}}`. The Turkish translation should follow this convention.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ortak {{productName}} dilini ve saatini ayarlamak için Dil ve Saat Dilimi Ayarlarını değiştirin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'щоб налаштувати загальну мову та час {{productName}}' is not a direct or natural translation of 'to adjust common {{productName}} language and time'. It implies setting the language and time *for* {{productName}}, rather than adjusting them generally within the system. A better translation would reflect the purpose of adjusting settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Змініть параметри мови та часового поясу, щоб налаштувати мову та час для {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "thời gian chung" (common time) is not the most natural or accurate translation of "time" in this context. It implies a shared or default time setting, which might not be the intention. A more appropriate translation would be 'giờ' or 'thời gian hiển thị'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thay đổi Cài đặt Ngôn ngữ và Múi giờ để điều chỉnh ngôn ngữ và thời gian hiển thị chung của {{productName}}.
